title: 2BR, 1 BA top floor unit w/ private rooftop!
posting_body: ['Unique Features', 'Top Floor Gut Rehab 2 bedroom condo for rent with PRIVATE rooftop deck and deck off the kitchen in the Edgewater neighborhood of Chicago!', 'Interior Highlights', 'This 2 bedroom condo for rent features updated stainless steel kitchen appliances, updated Bathroom, Hardwood Floors, Separate Living and Dining Spaces, Rear Deck, Private rooftop deck, Laundry In-Unit, and MORE.', 'The sunlight, hard wood floors!', 'Best Things About the Building', 'Great neighbors, and Pets Negotiable w/ Extra Fee.', 'No Parking Available On-Site (rental option across street).', 'Non-Smoking Unit.', 'One Month Security Deposit.', 'Additional Storage Un', 'Best Things About the Neighborhood', 'Right next to Lake Michigan and Foster Avenue Beach, this Edgewater condo for rent is a short walk to Andersonville - great shopping and dining!', 'Access to the Red Line and express bus downtown.', 'In Excellent Heart of Edgewater Location: Walking Distance to the CTA Red Line, Express Buses, Lakefront, Foster Beach, Marianos Grocery, Bryn Mawr Historic District.', 'The best of Edgewater Beach living!', "Why it's Worthy of Calling Home", 'Location and the private roof top deck!']
